name: SlothFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask Sloth Facts for a fact”
”Alexa, tell me something from Sloth Facts”
”Alexa, give me a fact from Sloth Facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sloth facts
des: With this skill, Alexa learns a whole bunch of fun facts about sloths. Simply ask Alexa for a sloth fact, and you'll get a random bit of info about everyone's favorite slow-moving mammal.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
